thread.section_title: Delta Reservation System Outage Causes Major Delays; Website Also Down – CBS New York
thread.title: Delta Reservation System Outage Causes Major Delays; Website Also Down
thread.title_full: Delta Reservation System Outage Causes Major Delays; Website Also Down

author: Adam Harrington
title: Delta Reservation System Outage Causes Major Delays; Website Also Down

organizations.name: delta reservation system outage causes major delays

text:
NEW YORK (CBSNewYork) — Delta Air Lines was experiencing major delays late Sunday due to a systemwide reservation system outage.
The Port Authority of New York and New Jersey advised the public of the outage late Sunday. Passengers were advised to contact Delta for updates.
CHECK: Flight Delays 
Delta announced on Twitter that it was experiencing “technical issues.”
The Delta website and app were also down late Sunday.
Last weekend, United Airlines grounded all domestic flights for about two hour due to an “an IT issue.”
Sources told CBS News’ Kris Van Cleave the airline’s Aircraft Communications Addressing and Reporting System (ACARS) for United went down on Sunday of last week. The system records and transmits information that pilots need to know in order to safely take off.
